name: Cat Simulator 2018: Rat VS Cat
description:
Kitten Cat Vs Rat Simulator 2018 is the amazing adventure game especially designed for children and families who want to enjoy.
You have played many simulation games like grey dog simulator, crazy dog racing games and crazy cat games. A new and fun kitty cat games for Cat lovers is now available with cat games twist.
Are you tired of wild animal simulator and dinosaur simulator games? Do you want to try out a new animal simulator 2018? How about pet simulation, maybe a Cat vs Rat chase game?
Five River Solutions brings you the best Cute Cat vs Rat Simulator 2018 game! This is for the lovers of pet animal games and crazy kittens! In this new pet Simulator Mouse chase 2018. Your job is to find Rat, 3D Spider and attack on them for prey! This Cat vs Mouse simulation will keep you addicted for hours!
Pet simulator games and cat games are loved by kids, so download it now for free and have fun by playing with kitten cat simulator 2018 game. Be the pet in this cat fighting game to explore the cool house in realistic environment with cute cat games and kitty cat games. Have fun hitting objects, making mess and jumping around in crazy cat games.
In this Mouse vs Cat Fight Simulator 2018, you play as one of the best Cat Simulator game resembles with Feline! There are 10 interesting levels in which you enjoy the best kitty cat games for free. Run and attack using your claws and teeth.
Download #1 Cat & Mouse Game on Mobile Today and Enjoy!

Features of Kitten Cat Adventure:
◆ 5 different Environments including shopping malls
◆ Challenging smashing objects missions
◆ Different Challenging Missions
◆ Smooth joystick with jump button to control the pussy cat
◆ HD graphics with amazing real life animations and sounds
◆ Funny mouse catching missions
